item.title: Tadhg add a quote by Aldous Huxley
item.description: "But if you know about God, why don’t you tell them?' asked the Savage indignantly. 'Why don’t you give them these books about God?' 'For the same reason as we don’t give them Othello: they’re old; they’re about God hundreds of years ago. Not about God now.' 'But God doesn’t change.' 'Men do, though.' 'What difference does that make?' "All the difference in the world,' said Mustapha Mond." -- Aldous Huxley
